DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study was to compare the Jamshidi, the BIG, the Cook, the EZIO intraosseous devices to standard peripheral venous catheterization during pediatric resuscitation.
DOC.criteria: give voluntary consent to participate in the study minimum 1 year of work experience in emergency medicine experienced emergency medical personnel EMSparamedics not meet the above criteria wrist or low back diseases
